projectBrief.businessPurpose: Launching a new AI-powered analytics dashboard to help SMBs make data-driven decisions
projectBrief.projectPhase: MVP Development - building core features and initial prototype
projectBrief.keyMetrics: Target 1000 beta users in first quarter, 80% feature completion, sub-2s dashboard load time
projectBrief.currentBlockers: Limited engineering resources, need to prioritize features for MVP scope

summary.title: Introduction to AI Analytics
summary.keyPoints: Overview of the market opportunity and current pain points that SMBs face with traditional analytics tools. Highlighting the 60% of SMBs that struggle with data interpretation.

summary.title: Our Solution: Smart Dashboard
summary.keyPoints: AI-powered dashboard that automatically surfaces insights, predicts trends, and provides actionable recommendations. Built specifically for small business owners without data science backgrounds.

summary.title: Market Traction & Revenue Model
summary.keyPoints: Beta program results showing 85% user satisfaction, $50/month subscription model with 12-month average retention. Projected $1.2M ARR by end of year one.

questions.question: What is your target audience's technical level?
What is the primary decision you need from this presentation?
What is your biggest competitive advantage?

userAnswers: Non-technical small business owners with limited data analysis experience
Secure $500K seed funding to scale development and acquire first 5000 customers
Our AI interprets data in plain English and proactively alerts owners to trends before they become problems
